column1: Maleficent :::A vengeful fairy is driven to curse an infant princess

column1: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes :::A growing nation of genetically evolved apes led by Caesar is threatened by a band of human survivors of the devastating virus unleashed a decade earlier.:::https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgwODk3NDc1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTc1NjQwMjE@._V1_UY1200_CR90

47 Ronin :::A band of samurai set out to avenge the death and dishonor of their master at the hands of a ruthless shogun.:::https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc0MjE2NzE0OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTU5MjE1MDE@._V1_UY1200_CR64
Captain America: The Winter Soldier :::As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world
column2: he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent
column3: Black Widow
column4: to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.:::https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzA2NDkwODAwM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODk5MTgzMTE@._V1_UY1200_CR96

column1: Shrek Forever After :::Rumpelstiltskin tricks a mid-life crisis burdened Shrek into allowing himself to be erased from existence and cast in a dark alternate timeline where Rumpel rules supreme.:::https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY0OTU1NzkxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzI2NDUzMw@@._V1_UY1200_CR89
Tomorrowland :::Bound by a shared destiny
column2: a teen bursting with scientific curiosity and a former boy-genius inventor embark on a mission to unearth the secrets of a place somewhere in time and space that exists in their collective memory.:::https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ0MDc5MjAyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzU5Mzk1NjE@._V1_UY1200_CR94

column1: Big Hero 6 :::The special bond that develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax

column1: Wreck-It Ralph :::A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream

column1: Independence Day: Resurgence :::Two decades after the first Independence Day invasion

column1: How to Train Your Dragon :::A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself
